input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: Hello, thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, we do not carry that specific product. However, we do have a few similar products that you may be interested in.
input_text.Response B: When the weather starts to turn cold, make sure you're ready to show your support for your favorite team with this MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Terry Full-Zip. This comfortable and stylish shirt is perfect for any fan, whether you're wearing it at the stadium or just out and about. It features a bold team logo on the chest, as well as a woven label and self-fabric applique for added detail. Made with cotton and organic cotton, it's sure to keep you warm all season long.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B seems totally irrelevant to the prompt.
